Actions.Name: Create new application
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new application in your account.

Actions.Name: Delete an application
Actions.Description: This operation is used to delete an existing application in your account.

Actions.Name: Get application by Id
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve information about a single application, given its id.

Actions.Name: List applications
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all applications associated with your account.

Actions.Name: List inbound numbers
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve all the inbound numbers that are avialble for a given country.

Actions.Name: List owned numbers
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves all numbers associated with your account.

Actions.Name: Send an SMS
Actions.Description: This operation is used to send an SMS.

Actions.Name: Send a speech file
Actions.Description: This operation is used to send a synthesized speech or recorded sound file to a phone number.

Actions.Name: Update an application
Actions.Description: This operation is used to modify an existing application in your account.
